content: a simple single_crochet edge you could also adapt frankie s knitted stuff ten stitch blanket for a bolder border or there are several beautiful choices in the books knitting on the edge or knitting over the edge both of these books can be purchased on amazon finishing using the darning needle sew in you ends when complete link this pattern in your project page i would love to see your blankets if you have any questions or have found an error please let me know ~ happy knitting wanda
